title: Crime Alert 03.29.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.29.19
description:
Cultist allegedly shoots her doomsday prepper boyfriend dead after being kicked out. Film worker suffers third degree burns over half his body on the set of Netflix's new Motley Crue movie. He’s now suing. Convicted pedophile faints in a Rhode Island court room when judge delivers a lengthy sentence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
